sen.j: これに対して、過去世に下種を受けていない本未有善（釈迦仏の機縁がない）の末法の衆生には、釈迦仏の説いた法華経では無益であり、過去の暦のように用をなさない意味のないものである。
sen.e: In opposition, as for the people in the period of Mappo (the phase of decadent after Zoho), or who are Hon-mi Uzen (having no qualification as Buddha) since they didn't receive Geshu in their past life, there is no value in Hokekyo which was preached by Shaka, and it is useless like a calender in the past years.

sen.j: したがって法華経本門の文底にある、本因妙・文底下種益の南無妙法蓮華経を信受けなければ成仏し得脱することはできないという。
sen.e: Because of that, if the people don't believe and receive Nanmyohorengekyo, which is Honinmyo, or a Geshu sunk under the words of Honmon sutras of Hokekyo, they can't become as a Buddha and earn Gedatsu.
